metadata.synopsis: One-linerSteel Watchers in the Streets minibooster.At Blushing MermaidOne of Flaming Fists - NOTE Please rename to Fist Rockbothem.

0.speaker: Fist Rockbothem
0.text: With our Steel Watchers turned into piles of junk, you'd think these traders would be happy to offer us a drink in consolation. Tightwads.

1.speaker: Fist Rockbothem
1.text: I'm in the right here! Strong drink qualifies as contraband - even thin piddle like Baalor's Ale.
